title: Race Metal Video Series with Miguel | All About the Beach Club Al Dente Gravel Bike
content:
For the fourth installment in our Race Metal Video Series, Miguel Ovalles gives his first impressions of the Beach Club Al Dente gravel bike and sits down with Teebow from Beach Club…

 

 

The post Race Metal Video Series with Miguel | All About the Beach Club Al Dente Gravel Bike appeared first on The Radavist.
